text: Bikanta is a startup biotech company that develops clinical products which focus on the detection of cancer through the insertion of fluorescent nanodiamonds. == History == The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Berkeley, California. Bikanta raised $120k in seed funding in 2014. In 2014, Bikanta participated in the Y Combinator program and was one of four companies backed by Y Combinator. == Awards and recognitions == *Named one of four Best Diagnostic startups by QB3. *Won first place at the 11th Annual Business Plan Competition of The Silicon Valley Boomer Venture Summit. *Participated in the California Life Sciences Institute's FAST Advisory Program. ==References== Category:Life sciences industry Category:Technology companies based in the San Francisco Bay Area Category:Biotechnology companies of the United States Category:2013 establishments in California Category:Companies based in Alameda County, California Category:Biotechnology companies established in 2013
title: Bikanta
